meaningMnemonic: If <kanji>sand</kanji> makes a lot of <kanji>profit</kanji>, it swells up and becomes <vocabulary>gravel</vocabulary>. They're like the fat cats of the beach.
readingMnemonic:
You learned the reading for 利 with the kanji, but the reading for 砂 is irregular, so here's a mnemonic to help you:

You're walking through that big fat <vocabulary>gravel</vocabulary>, when a pile of it starts moving, and something suddenly leaps out at you. It's a... <reading>ja</reading>guar (じゃ)! Run!
